## customerFromPaymentIntentId variable

Extracts the Stripe Customer from a Payment Intent Id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
customerFromPaymentIntentId: ({ stripe, pi_id }: Config) => Promise<{
    error: Error;
    value?: undefined;
} | {
    value: Stripe.Customer;
    error?: undefined;
}>
```
